QuickHelper Project home

URL

Get all tasks

GET /api/tasks

Response

Get tasks by id

GET /api/tasks/:id

Parameter

  • :id: task unique identifier

Response

add a task

POST /api/tasks

Request

Response

update a task

PUT /api/tasks/:id

Parameter

  • :id: task unique identifier

Request

Response

delete a task

DELETE /api/tasks/:id

Parameter

  • :id: task unique identifier

Request
